header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Recycling, impact on whales, volcanoes, reusing bottles, Forest School, school bins, gardening club, growing things, love, Angry Birds game

body.u: okay so you were gonna tell me about what you learnt about recycling
I learnt that some bit that er the first piece of plastic ever made is still alive today and that plastic cannot rot put it in the bin it's still there it's not gone and erm do you know what?
there's so much plastic that in the sea which er and it could circle the w earth four times
and if it goes outside and I think don't think people are taking care then because I cos er today I see loads of wrappers everywhere
we did spot some rubbish didn't we? on the way back from school
yeah and do you know what?
how can they die from plastic?
cos like if they've got a sharp bit of plastic or and it's fraying a worm could come up and get hurt
mm erm er maybe last year or the year before at some point people found a dead whale on the beach and they wante or dolphin and they wanted to know why it was dead erm so they looked inside it
and there was like a huge load of rubbish inside it
yeah it was swimming in the sea and it and it got all of it in its mouth and it died because of that so some er so some people have just been chucking their rubbish in the sea
well sometimes it ends up in the sea
yeah well they haven't been putting it away
but where does it go? cos you went to see where it rubbish goes didn't you ? last year?
I might've but I don't remember it
do you guys know where the rubbish goes when it's collected?
it g not really it goes to a big landfill site
they don't bury it it's just there so
you know we have three different bins? what are the three different bins for?
and that's what goes to the landfill
and I think every bit of plastic we have like that container we recycle
we do although I think you can't recycle erm plastic if er if meat has been on it even if you wash it I can't remember
but I know a great way to get rid of plastic
dig down quite deep find some lava pour it on the plastic and it sizzles away
well that is a good theory actually perhaps we could all put stuff into a volcano
because er when it e because if the volcano was like able to erupt
then it might erupt and there will bits of plastic still left in the lava
no no it would it would burn but how do you think you can get to the lava without the lava coming up to us?
it's pretty well it's pretty dangerous isn't it?
some people have been near volcanoes although lava is generally travels slow slowly so
no no that's a good idea I think we could drop stuff into the volcano
unless the volcano did a gigantic spitting eruption which it where it goes kaboom then you'd probably be safe
because mum some volcanoes are known to hold treasures in
known to hold treasure? are they?
no they're not you just watched Tom and Jerry
no some no I've heard that some volcanoes are so special that nobody puts anything in
I don't think I've ever heard that
well I'm just going to ask a volcano expert about that
we did used to burn rubbish but then we realised that the burning was very bad for the environment yeah cos of carbon monoxide and things but if a volcano is already burning I think that yeah
for the air mm maybe if we dug a tunnel through the centre of the earth
maybe if you done dug a tunnel to the centre of the earth?
if we dug a tunnel to the centre of the earth
like close enough for us to drop it it's close enough for us to see the all the lava inside it or just to find some lava underground mm and then
they could drop the rubbish in and it would either sizzle away or explode
I think that would make for a very unstable tunnel though and it
because of the heat and did you know the gravitational pull it does pull things into the centre of the earth so if we got too near people were digging they'd just get sucked into that bit
mm they w we would turn rubbish alive and it would dig inside
I think it's a kind of quite a a dangerous option but we do recycle our recycling bin has got paper and glass and plastic in it so that is recycled
yeah as if I was saving the ketchup bottle for something

I don't want us to start recycling things because er well however we are going to keep this ketchup bottle because we're going to do that pancake recipe where you can do do two different types of pancake mixture so
I guess we'll be reusing it that way mm?
we'd erm soon we might need to get my a container for the forest school
might need to get a container for forest school
for forest school? what do you need a container for?
you know the small container for drink
you just need a carton or a bottle but
so it'll be you next half-term or the last half-term of school
sit down but dad's in charge of that because daddy is going to be taking you guys into school on the same day as 's doing forest school so I've told him that he needs to do that
woah so that's in one day time
it's not in one day's time because it's Monday today
can I please have one of these after I've finished?
Tuesday Wednesday Thursday yes you can have a Jaffa cake when you've finished
what about the blueberry the raspberry thingy muffin muffiny cake things?
anything else you know about recycling?
yeah it'd be good if someone recycled anything like at all the time like every second something is being recycled
something was at least being planned to recycle it and not just throw it away
well we don't as I say we're not allowed to just throw plastic away any more we have to put it in a recycling bin so that's good at least

yeah and erm on Thursday we found the plastic little ring and she was gonna put it in the bin and she said she'll put it in the mushroom bin and I said why not the erm the hippo bin? and she said because it's alive and get struck in its throat
yeah and but that but that bin is huge so it's got like this is how big they are and this is how wide and this was how erm big erm it was look
oh dear oh dear so she could've put it in there
she put it in the mushroom bin
well perhaps it isn't the best thing to have bins in the shape of animals
but anyway it was the most expensive one
how do you guys know that?
because the school councillors decided er decided it and it was mentioned in assembly
what? and they chose the most expensive one?
yeah the school councillors chosen the most expensive one
I want to be a school councillor
have you not been one yet?
not everyone in the class can be a school councillor
I really want to join the gardening club but it's not on any more
no it isn't but you did get to do it so
yeah and the new flowers we are so nice
well you can make you can plant flowers here
although I'm not entirely sure why I ever did gardening the gardening club in the first place
you are not sure what happened?
why I did it in the first place
I don't remember doing it for very long
it was kind of I didn't actually en I it wasn't actually fun
well you enjoyed it didn't you?
all I got was a sticker at the end
and now whenever I into the habitat garden I always love seeing what I've done
in garde when I was in gardening club it was in the courtyard
hang on you're both talking at the same time what ?
when I was in gardening club we did it in the courtyard
I did it in erm the habitat garden outside they have this garden erm close to 's playground
why? cos you got to that was the timber playground
what did you like about it ?
erm about making more plants for the environment
about and their environment you said?
look an L that stands for love
it looks like an L-shape it's L for load?
love ah well you can plant things at home
mum and dad equals me equals
have you been learning about reproduction today or something?
I was just saying cos said that then that made me think of me and daddy and you and and and
speak properly because I can't hear what you're saying love equals what?
well when said L for love it made me think of me and loving you and dad
so mum and dad so mum and equals and me
sorry I can't hear what you are saying
no cos he didn't give birth
mum and dad equals and me and you equals and me our dad equals chaos
well we can have si we have erm
did you get on with them alright this weekend?
yeah but they but in the morning of er the the first day they did play some pranks on me and I and even and
they did what? they all ganged up on you?
yeah because they put a fake spider in my bed
and on the second day er someone did something really annoying to my game they my free power up erm that that I have on Angry Birds
and they also wasted loads of my gems which are really precious to me
what? er hhow were you playing on this thing?
well why were they playing on your tablet?
erm I'm not sure which one it was but it may've been cos I allowed her to play on my tablet but only on Fruit Ninja
well why was she playing with one of your games if you were in the middle of it?
because I wasn't I stopped playing on it
oh oh I don't understand these things but normally you get on with don't you?
yeah but i I'm not sure if it was her
oh did you mention it though?
although we still don't know who it was
but people know not to do it now? yeah?
yeah but they might do it again anyway
I don't think they will do it
finished please can I get down?
have you fin no you've hardly had anything to eat
